messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com
Hello
Hello! Welcome to FightLust.com! How can we support you in your journey towards healing today?
My daughter 24 yrs is into alcohol drug and fornication

I'm sorry to hear that your daughter is struggling. It's important to seek support during such challenging times. Would you like to share a prayer request for her? We're here to pray with you and for her.
Please pray for her deliverance and salvation

Heavenly Father, we come before you today, lifting up this precious daughter. We pray for her deliverance from alcohol, drugs, and fornication. Lord, we ask for your healing touch upon her life and that she may find salvation in You. Surround her with your love and guidance, and lead her towards a path of healing and freedom. In Jesus' name, we pray. Amen.

If you need further support or resources, feel free to ask!
Is there a scripture to pray for her deliverance from lust

Yes, there are several scriptures that can be prayed for deliverance from lust. Here are a few you might find helpful:

1. **1 John 1:9** - "If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness."
2. **Romans 12:1** - "I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship."
3. **1 Corinthians 6:18** - "Flee from sexual immorality. Every other sin a person commits is outside the body, but the sexually immoral person sins against his own body."
4. **Galatians 5:16** - "But I say, walk by the Spirit, and you will not gratify the desires of the flesh."

You can incorporate these verses into your prayers for her deliverance. If you need more specific prayers or guidance, let me know!
Thanks so much
You're very welcome! If you have any more questions or need further support, feel free to reach out. We're here to help you. God bless!
I will pray those over her

That's wonderful to hear! Praying those scriptures over her can be very powerful. If you need any more resources or support, don't hesitate to ask. We're here for you. God bless you and your daughter!
Yes
If there's anything specific you'd like to discuss or any questions you have, feel free to share! I'm here to help.
Yes
It seems like you might have something on your mind. How can I assist you further?
I am heartbroken over my daughter‚Äôs situation

I'm really sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. It's completely understandable to feel heartbroken when a loved one is struggling. Remember, you're not alone in this. We can offer support and prayer for your daughter. Would you like to share a specific prayer request or talk about how you're feeling?
She is into addictions and soon after work she goes out doing drugs and alcohol and fornication

That sounds incredibly difficult, and my heart goes out to you. It's painful to see a loved one caught in such struggles. It's great that you're seeking support and prayer for her. Would you like me to pray for her deliverance and healing? We can also discuss any resources that might help you both during this challenging time.
I pray hard everyday that she stays at home in her apartment and not go anywhere

It's commendable that you're praying for her safety and well-being every day. Your prayers can be a source of strength for both you and your daughter. If you'd like, I can help you find specific prayers or scriptures to support your prayers for her to find peace and stay home. Just let me know how I can assist you further!
I keep checking her location app and gets heartbroken when I see her somewhere unsafe places and doing ungodly things

I can only imagine how distressing that must be for you. It's natural to worry about her safety and well-being, especially when you see her in unsafe situations. Remember, you're doing your best by praying for her and seeking support. If you want, we can pray together for her protection and for her to find the strength to make better choices. You're not alone in this, and we're here to support you.
It is 1:24 pm on the east coast
she gets off from work around 5:30 or 6
Thank you for sharing that! If there's anything specific you'd like to discuss or if you have any questions, feel free to let me know. I'm here to help you in any way I can.

Thank you for sharing that. It sounds like you're very mindful of her schedule and concerned about her well-being. As her workday comes to an end, it might be a good time to pray for her safety and for her to make positive choices. If you‚Äôd like, I can help you with a specific prayer or scripture to focus on during that time. Just let me know how I can assist you!
and from now I will be worrying and praying that she should stay home

It's completely understandable to feel that way, especially when you care so deeply for her. Your prayers can be a powerful source of hope and strength. If you need any specific prayers or scriptures to guide your thoughts during this time, I'm here to help. Just let me know how I can support you!
One year ago she got severely injured in her left leg and foot so much so she had major surgeries and still not able to walk properly or play sports or run

I'm truly sorry to hear about your daughter's injury and the challenges she's facing with her recovery. That must be incredibly difficult for both of you. It's important to keep her in your prayers for healing and strength during this time. If you'd like, I can help you find specific prayers or scriptures that focus on healing and comfort. Just let me know how I can assist you further!
she got discouraged hopeless and stopped going to church or anything to do with God

It's heartbreaking to hear that she's feeling discouraged and has distanced herself from her faith. This can be a tough time for her, and your support and prayers can make a significant difference. Encouraging her gently to reconnect with her faith and community might help her find hope again. If you'd like, I can provide you with prayers or scriptures that focus on hope and encouragement to share with her. Just let me know how I can help!
She is into all kinds of evil practices

It sounds like your daughter is going through a very challenging time, and it's understandable to feel concerned about her choices. Prayer can be a powerful tool in seeking guidance and healing for her. If you would like, I can provide you with specific prayers or scriptures that address deliverance and protection. Just let me know how I can assist you further!
she is being oppressed by evil spirits

It's deeply concerning to hear that you believe she is being oppressed by evil spirits. This is a serious matter, and prayer for her deliverance and protection is essential. If you'd like, I can share a prayer for breaking ungodly ties and seeking freedom from oppression. Just let me know how I can support you in this!
a lot of them

It sounds like you're feeling overwhelmed by the situation, and it's understandable given the circumstances. Prayer can be a powerful way to seek deliverance from these challenges. If you're interested, I can provide you with a specific prayer that addresses breaking free from oppression and seeking healing. Just let me know how you'd like to proceed!
She is surrounded by toxic friendships and soul ties

It's concerning to hear that she's surrounded by toxic friendships and soul ties, as these can significantly impact her well-being. Breaking ungodly soul ties through prayer can be a vital step in her healing journey. If you'd like, I can share a prayer that focuses on breaking these ties and seeking freedom from negative influences. Just let me know how I can assist you further!
more loyal to her friends who are a bad influence than the family
Please post prayer that you are talking about

It must be incredibly difficult to see her prioritizing those friendships over family, especially when you know they are a bad influence. This can create a lot of pain and concern for you. Encouraging her to reflect on her relationships and their impact on her life might be helpful. If you‚Äôd like, I can provide prayers or scriptures that focus on wisdom in choosing friends and the importance of family. Just let me know how I can support you!
thanks for the scriptures

Here‚Äôs a prayer that you can use to break ungodly soul ties and seek deliverance from toxic influences:

---

**Heavenly Father,**

We come before your throne today, seeking your strength and guidance. We renounce all toxic friendships and ungodly soul ties that have formed in our lives. In the name of Jesus Christ, we break all connections with those who lead us away from you and your truth.

We cast out all spirits of loneliness that may drive us to seek validation in harmful relationships. We command all spirits of perversion and negativity to leave now in the name of Jesus Christ. We take authority over our thoughts and bind all spirits that would keep us in bondage to unhealthy influences.

Lord, we ask for your protection and healing. Fill us with your Holy Spirit and help us to seek relationships that uplift and encourage us in our walk with you. We thank you for your love and grace, and we trust in your power to restore and renew our lives.

In Jesus' name, we pray. Amen.

---

Feel free to share this prayer with your daughter or pray it for her. If you need more support or resources, just let me know!

You're welcome! Here are some scriptures that you can use in prayer for your daughter's deliverance and healing:

1. **Psalm 25:11** - "For your name's sake, O LORD, pardon my guilt, for it is great."
2. **Philippians 4:6-7** - "Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus."
3. **Ephesians 6:12** - "For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places."
4. **2 Corinthians 10:4-5** - "For the weapons of our warfare are not of the flesh but have divine power to destroy strongholds. We destroy arguments and every lofty opinion raised against the knowledge of God, and take every thought captive to obey Christ."

Feel free to use these scriptures in your prayers for her. If you need more specific prayers or guidance, just let me know!
I hope I can retrieve the scriptures before the chat disappears

I understand the urgency! Here are the scriptures again for you to easily copy:

1. **Psalm 25:11** - "For your name's sake, O LORD, pardon my guilt, for it is great."
2. **Philippians 4:6-7** - "Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus."
3. **Ephesians 6:12** - "For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places."
4. **2 Corinthians 10:4-5** - "For the weapons of our warfare are not of the flesh but have divine power to destroy strongholds. We destroy arguments and every lofty opinion raised against the knowledge of God, and take every thought captive to obey Christ."

Feel free to save these, and if you need anything else, just let me know!
What is your website and ministry

Our ministry is FightLust.com, dedicated to aiding individuals struggling with pornography and sexual addiction through spiritual support and biblical guidance. We offer prayers, resources, and community support to encourage healing and freedom in Christ. If you have any specific questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
Thank you so very much üôè
You're very welcome! üôè If you need any more support or have further questions, don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to help you on your journey!

I will check this ministry
at present she is having the spirit of lust 
ans i am asking God to free her 
this spirit deives her to go and get into sexual sins

It's great to hear that you're seeking God's help for your daughter. We can certainly pray for her deliverance from the spirit of lust and for her healing. 

Here's a prayer you can use:

"Heavenly Father, we come before you today asking for your divine intervention in [daughter's name]'s life. We pray that you break the chains of the spirit of lust that is driving her towards sexual sins. Lord, we ask for your strength and guidance to fill her heart and mind, leading her towards purity and freedom in Christ. We trust in your power to heal and restore her. In Jesus' name, we pray. Amen."

If you need more resources or specific prayers, just let me know!

I will let youknow
wondering how you are typing so quickly ans precisely and accuratwly üò≥

I'm glad to hear you're finding the responses helpful! üòä I‚Äôm designed to provide quick and accurate information to assist you effectively. If you have any more questions or need support, feel free to ask anytime!

Thanks so much 
please remember her in your prayers  and add her in the prayer group list of your ministry 
her name is Shw
Her name is Shekinah 24 yrs

Thank you for sharing Shw's name with us. While I can't directly add her to a prayer group list, I encourage you to share her name with your community or prayer group so they can lift her up in prayer. 

We will keep her in our thoughts and prayers here at FightLust.com. If you have any other requests or need further support, just let me know!

Thank you for sharing Shekinah's name with us. We will certainly keep her in our prayers. While I can't add her to a prayer group list directly, I encourage you to share her name with our community for prayer support. 

If you have any specific prayer requests or need further assistance, just let me know! We're here to support you both.
Thanks so much
You're very welcome! If you need anything else or have more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. We're here to help! Take care! üòä
